column2: I thought it was interesting a friend of mine ordered the large salad
column3: since I was surprised how enormous it was! It was so big that it could be shared with 2-3 people
column4: depending on how much or little one wants to eat
column5: so I'd advise ordering a small salad if you want salad to yourself. Another friend of mine ordered the fries
column6: and I like that you do get a generous portion of fries
column8: how can I forget to mention the crowds? They were so much
column10: I'll hit this place outside of their dinner rush
column11: and likely get their food to go instead. Too little seating for all the crowds they get.
